product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing and commission of VOC detector with range of 1 – 1000 ppm isobutylene equivalent.and following accessoriesa) DigiPID internal dust filter (Pack of 5) b) Waterproof Filter Assy, RAEGuard2 PID, Pack of 5 c) DigiPID Teflon UV electrode shield pack of 10 d) DigiPID Dust Cover e) Air Drying Pre Filter Kit f) DigiPID external water trap filter (Pack of 5)

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D5 | FDA SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of aspiration detector with CMOS imager combined with multiple photodiode for reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms. The detector should have 4 pipe inlet and min 100m pipelength support per inlet.The detector should have Smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance& coverage area of min 5000 Sq.

product_entries.feature_or_specifications: imager: CMOS, sensor: multiple photodiode, feature: very early warning, feature: minimal nuisance alarms, feature: smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance

original_rows.1: Providing & fixing ARMOURED CABLING complete with lugs, laying and termination of both ends.

Supply, erection, fabrication, testing and commission of VOC detector with range of 1 – 1000 ppm isobutylene equivalent.and following accessoriesa) DigiPID internal dust filter (Pack of 5) b) Waterproof Filter Assy, RAEGuard2 PID, Pack of 5 c) DigiPID Teflon UV electrode shield pack of 10 d) DigiPID Dust Cover e) Air Drying Pre Filter Kit f) DigiPID external water trap filter (Pack of 5)

Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of aspiration detector with CMOS imager combined with multiple photodiode for reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms. The detector should have 4 pipe inlet and min 100m pipelength support per inlet.The detector should have Smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance& coverage area of min 5000 Sq.
Supply,Installation,Testing & Commissioning of  UL/VDS listed CPVC Pipe 25 mm Dia & Pipe Accessories for the Aspiration detection.
Supply, fabrication, erection & testing of GI CABLE TRAYS FOR LAYING ALL TYPE OF CABLES AS INDICATED ABOVE INCLUDING ALL NECESSARY STRUCTURAL SUPPORTS.

IP based Networkable touch screen paging station for selection of zones, supervision of system status, setting of scheduled broadcasts with the following functions: . Central exchage with Stand by CPU  . Built-in monitoring loudspeaker  . Goose-neck microphone  . LCD touchscreen display  . Audio input

30 W High Efficiency  Horn type of Speaker with weather protection IP 65 (Weatherproof Type, Suitable for Outdoor Area)
Rack Mounted  500 watt Power Amplifier with battery back up (Wattage shall be as per requirement)
2C x 1.5 mm2 multi stranded, shielded, Armoured,  XLPE Cu Cable for Power & Signal
